The purpose of this document is to work out the `Gapminder`
exmplw from [RBoogtcamp](https://github.com/laderast/RBootcamp_old/blob/master/chapter1.md)

```{r loadPackages, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(gapminder)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r startOne}
gap1992 <- gapminder %>% filter(year == 1992)

head(gap1992)

colnames(gap1992)

nrow(gap1992)
```

# First plot

```{r firstPlot}
plt <- ggplot(gap1992,
       aes(x = log(gdpPercap), y = lifeExp, size=pop, color=continent)) +
       geom_point() +
       ggtitle("Gapminder for 1992") +
       NULL

print(plt)
```
